title: Game Map Save
description: The structure of how a map save is stored.

isEntry.description: Whether this room is the entry. Note, only one entry is allowed per map.

exits.description: The possible exits (id) that this room has. Index 0 is for the north exit, 1 for the east, 2 for the south, and 3 for the west. -1 for no exit.

info.description: The description of the room to be used in the game. It is used as-is within game.
